title: SLFP quit government
body_lines: The Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) has decided to quit as a government coalition and will sit independently in Parliament.
Sources told Daily Mirror that the SLFP met President Gotabaya Rajapaksa for urgent talks this afternoon but discussions failed.
Former President Maithripala Sirisena will make a special announcement in Parliament tomorrow. (Jamila Husain)
